string.text: MAI - Mutant/Anomaly Interaction\nNPC Anomaly Evasion System by AllC0r3\nv2.2 - Rank & Movement State Detection
Enable or disable the entire MAI system. When disabled, NPCs will not evade anomalies.
Enable debug mode to see detailed logging in the console. Useful for troubleshooting issues.
How often NPCs check for nearby anomalies (in milliseconds). Lower values = more responsive but higher CPU usage. Default: 2000ms
Enable armor-based damage multipliers. Different suits provide different protection against anomalies.
Maximum length of the restriction string buffer. Higher values allow more anomalies to be tracked but may impact performance. Default: 3072
When restriction limit is reached, detection radius is multiplied by this factor. Lower values = more aggressive reduction. Default: 0.75
Miss chance multiplier when NPC is standing still. Lower = less likely to miss anomalies. Standing NPCs are very careful and observant. Default: 0.3
Miss chance multiplier when NPC is walking. Lower = less likely to miss anomalies. Walking NPCs have time to observe their surroundings. Default: 0.6
Miss chance multiplier when NPC is running. Higher = more likely to miss anomalies. Running NPCs may not notice dangers. Default: 1.2
Miss chance multiplier when NPC is in combat. Higher = more likely to miss anomalies. Combat distracts NPCs from environmental hazards. Default: 3.0
Percentage chance for Novice rank NPCs to miss detecting an anomaly. Inexperienced stalkers often walk into anomalies. Default: 100%
Percentage chance for Trainee rank NPCs to miss detecting an anomaly. Still learning to navigate the Zone. Default: 75%
Percentage chance for Experienced rank NPCs to miss detecting an anomaly. Getting better at spotting dangers. Default: 50%
Percentage chance for Professional rank NPCs to miss detecting an anomaly. Skilled at navigating anomaly fields. Default: 25%
Percentage chance for Veteran rank NPCs to miss detecting an anomaly. Highly experienced Zone survivors. Default: 0%
Percentage chance for Expert rank NPCs to miss detecting an anomaly. Masters of Zone navigation. Default: 0%
Percentage chance for Master rank NPCs to miss detecting an anomaly. Elite stalkers who know every danger. Default: 0%
Percentage chance for Legend rank NPCs to miss detecting an anomaly. Legendary stalkers - the best of the best. Default: 0%
Display detected anomalies as markers on the PDA map. Updates every 10 seconds. Requires Debug Mode enabled.
Log NPC subscribe/unsubscribe events to the console. Requires Debug Mode enabled.
Log anomaly restriction add/remove events to the console. Requires Debug Mode enabled.
Log anomaly damage events to the console. Requires Debug Mode enabled.
Log every detection cycle to the console. WARNING: Very verbose! Only enable for specific debugging. Requires Debug Mode enabled.
